expl: Main function. Match a random name to a random object.
Add a new name / object to the list.
Remove a name / object from the list.
Clear data(name / obj / all) from the list.
Load data to the target list from the target file.
detail:
Usage > help / help <command> 
Use help to show all commands, help <command> to show a specific command and its details.

Usage > match 
Use match to match a random name to a random object.

Usage > add <target> <name> 
Use add <target (name / object)> <name> to add a new name or object to the data.

Usage > remove <target> <name> 
Use remove <target (name / object)> <name> to remove a name or object from the data.

Usage > clear <data> 
Use clear <data (name / object / all)> to clear names data, objects data, or all data.

Usage > stop 
Use stop to stop this program.

Usage > load <target> <path> 
Use load <target(name/ object)> <path (absolute file path)> to load data to the target list from the target file.
